statements: SELECT * FROM circulation ORDER BY quantity_distributed DESC
SELECT newspaper_name, magazine_name, quantity_distributed FROM circulation WHERE newspaper_name='Daily Times'
SELECT newspaper_name, delivery_schedule FROM circulation WHERE quantity_distributed > 1000 ORDER BY delivery_schedule ASC
SELECT * FROM circulation WHERE magazine_name LIKE '%Fashion%'
SELECT route_id, newspaper_name, quantity_distributed FROM circulation
SELECT * FROM circulation WHERE quantity_distributed > 100 ORDER BY newspaper_name DESC
SELECT newspaper_name, magazine_name FROM circulation WHERE delivery_schedule = 'Daily'
SELECT route_id, quantity_distributed FROM circulation WHERE magazine_name IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM circulation ORDER BY quantity_distributed ASC, newspaper_name ASC
SELECT route_id, newspaper_name, delivery_schedule FROM circulation WHERE newspaper_name LIKE '%Times%'
SELECT * FROM newspapers WHERE newspaper_id = 1;
SELECT newspaper_name, distribution_route_id FROM newspapers;
SELECT magazine_name, quantity_distributed FROM magazines WHERE quantity_distributed > 100;
SELECT * FROM newspapers ORDER BY newspaper_name DESC;
SELECT magazine_name, delivery_schedule FROM magazines WHERE magazine_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM newspapers ORDER BY newspaper_name DESC;
SELECT newspaper_name, distribution_route_id FROM newspapers WHERE distribution_route_id = 1;
SELECT newspaper_name, quantity_distributed FROM newspapers JOIN magazines ON newspapers.distribution_route_id = magazines.quantity_distributed;
SELECT * FROM magazines WHERE quantity_distributed >= 100 ORDER BY magazine_name ASC;
SELECT magazine_name, delivery_schedule FROM magazines WHERE delivery_schedule LIKE '%daily%';
SELECT * FROM distribution_routes;
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location, end_location FROM distribution_routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM distribution_routes WHERE start_location = 'City A' ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT d.schedule_id, d.delivery_date, q.newspaper_quantity FROM delivery_schedules d JOIN quantities_distributed q ON d.distribution_id = q.distribution_id;
SELECT route_name, end_location, start_location FROM distribution_routes WHERE route_name LIKE '%Express%' ORDER BY start_location, end_location ASC;
SELECT * FROM distribution_routes;
SELECT start_location, end_location FROM distribution_routes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM distribution_routes WHERE route_id = 3;
SELECT schedule_id, delivery_date, delivery_time FROM delivery_schedules WHERE distribution_id = 5 ORDER BY delivery_date ASC, delivery_time ASC;
SELECT route_id, SUM(newspaper_quantity) AS total_newspapers_distributed FROM quantities_distributed GROUP BY route_id HAVING total_newspapers_distributed > 1000;
SELECT * FROM circulation_route;
SELECT route_name, route_id FROM circulation_route;
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM circulation_route ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM newspaper_distribution WHERE quantity_distributed > 100;
SELECT route_id, distribution_date FROM newspaper_distribution WHERE route_id = 5 AND distribution_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM circulation_route;
SELECT route_name, route_id FROM circulation_route WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT distribution_id, quantity_distributed FROM newspaper_distribution WHERE distribution_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT magazine_id, quantity_distributed, distribution_date FROM magazine_distribution ORDER BY distribution_date DESC;
SELECT route_id, delivery_time, delivery_day FROM delivery_schedule WHERE delivery_day = 'Monday' ORDER BY delivery_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM circulation_routes;
SELECT route_name, area_covered FROM circulation_routes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT publication_id, distribution_date FROM distribution WHERE quantity_distributed > 100;
SELECT * FROM newspapers WHERE language = 'English';
SELECT magazine_name, publisher FROM magazines WHERE category = 'Fashion' ORDER BY magazine_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM circulation_routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT newspaper_name, language FROM newspapers WHERE publication_frequency = 'Daily';
SELECT magazine_name, category, publisher FROM magazines ORDER BY magazine_name ASC;
SELECT route_name, area_covered, COUNT(*) AS distribution_count FROM circulation_routes JOIN distribution ON circulation_routes.route_id = distribution.route_id GROUP BY route_name, area_covered;
SELECT delivery_day, delivery_time FROM delivery_schedules WHERE route_id = 2 AND delivery_day IN ('Monday', 'Wednesday') ORDER BY delivery_time DESC;
